Somadina Adinma bụ onye Naijiria na-eme ihe nkiri na ihe nlereanya
Somadina Adinma malitere ime ihe nkiri na 2003, mgbe ọ ka bụ nwatakịrị di afọ 8 (asatọ) mgbe ọ malitere na ihe nkiri na-atọ ọchị nke akpọrọ Charge and Bail
Ihe e jiri mara ya karịsịa bụ maka ọrụ ọ rụrụ na ihe nkiri Nollywood Ordinary Fellows, Breath of Anger, na Forest of Promises
N'afọ 2007, a họpụtara ya maka onyinye nke Best Performance by a Child na 3rd Africa Movie Academy Awards
N'afọ 2019, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na ihe nkiri Ordinary Fellows na ọrụ 'DJ Cash'.
